titleStmt.title: The profit of imprisonment A paradox, vvritten in French by Odet de la Noue, Lord of Teligni, being prisoner in the castle of Tournay. Translated by Iosuah Silvester.
Paradoxe que les adversitez sont plus necessaires que les prosperités. English
titleStmt.author: La Noue, Odet de, seigneur de Téligny, d. 1618.
Sylvester, Josuah, 1563-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Peter Short, for Edward Blunt,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Paradoxe que les adversitez sont plus necessaires que les prosperités.
Running title reads: A paradox. against libertie.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
